scheme_name: Subsidy Scheme On Establishment Of - 25 Kadaknath/R.I.R. Birds Unit To Scheduled Tribes (Gujarat)
description: This scheme provides financial assistance to Scheduled Tribe individuals for establishing a poultry unit with 25 Kadaknath or R.I.R. birds to promote self-employment.
key_features: Subsidy of Rs. 6,000 for 25 Kadaknath/R.I.R. birds unit

category_criteria: Applicant must belong to Scheduled Tribes
eligibility.additional_criteria: Must be a resident of Gujarat

special_notes: Option to choose between Kadaknath or R.I.R. birds
